author: hwright
msg: On the 1.6.x-future-proof branch:
If we don't discover that we're in a working copy, try and determine if we're
in a working copy from the future.  In other words, recurse up the directory
tree looking for a wc.db, and return its version number if found.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/questions.c
(is_inside_wc_ng): New.
(svn_wc_check_wc): Check for the wc-ng format, if no other format is found.
(svn_wc__check_format): Adjust the error message.  Users don't have a
snowball's chance in a very hot place of downgrading from 1.7 to 1.6.

author: hwright
msg: Create test branch for future proofing future versions of 1.6.x in the face of
the pending switch to wc-ng.

author: hwright
msg: Add yet another script, this one for doing an area graph of the wc-ng data
collected by gather-data.sh.
* tools/dev/wc-ng/graph-data.py:
New.

author: hwright
msg: Add a script which gathers historical data using the wc-ng progress counting
script, and then outputs that data to a csv file.
* tools/dev/wc-ng/gather-data.sh:
New.

author: hwright
msg: Rearrange the wc-ng counting script into a new tools subdir, in preparation
for a few more useful scripts.
* tools/dev/count-wc-ng.py:
Moved to...
* tools/dev/wc-ng/count-progress.py:
...here.  Also adjust the default path to reflect the change.
